data.title: Facebook reached out to Netflix, Disney on new TV device, report says
data.text: The device will reportedly use the same tech as Facebook Portal.

data.title: Facebook's streaming box could land in living rooms in October
data.text: Last year, reports emerged Facebook was working on a video chat camera you'd plug into your TV.

data.title: Facebook's Privacy Red Tape Is Secondary To Its Potential
data.text: Revenue growth surprised this quarter as it reaccelerated from Q1.

data.title: Facebook's Expanding Search Advertising
data.text: More marketers can now place ads in Facebook's search results, but there's a catch.

data.title: Patel warns Facebook about end-to-end encryption
data.text: New Home Secretary Priti Patel has reignited a debate about privacy and the government's ability to surveil communications as she criticised Facebook's plans to use end-to-end encryption.

data.title: Facebook developing device to type words you are thinking
data.text: Facebook has announced a major breakthrough in its plans to allow people to type just by thinking of the words they want to use.

data.title: Facebook says 'not our role' to remove content some politicians 'consider to be false'
data.text: Facebook rejects Australian political party's claim about fake news.
